name: whipped-dream
effect: Traded on a Swirlix: Holder evolves into Slurpuff.
short_effect: Traded on a Swirlix: Holder evolves into Slurpuff.

flavor_text.sun-moon: A soft and sweet treat made of fluffy, puffy, whipped, and whirled cream. It’s loved by a certain Pokémon.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: A soft and sweet treat made of fluffy, puffy, whipped, and whirled cream. It’s loved by a certain Pokémon.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: A soft and sweet treat made of fluffy, puffy, whipped, and whirled cream. It’s loved by a certain Pokémon.
